text: Ethan Chidiebere Nwaneri (born 21 March 2007) is an English professional footballer. He plays as an attacking midfielder for Premier League club Arsenal. ==Club career== Nwaneri was born in London and joined Arsenal as an eight years old. He played his first Premier League match on 18 September 2022, against Brentford, at the age of 15 years and 181 days. This made him the youngest ever Arsenal player, and the youngest person to play in the Premier League, breaking Harvey Elliott's record. ==References== == Other websites == * Profile at the Arsenal F.C. website Category:2007 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from London Category:Arsenal F.C. players Category:Premier League players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Black British sportspeople
title: Ethan Nwaneri
